personalization_char_count_max.description: This is an integer value representing the maximum length for the personalization message entered by the buyer. Will only change if is_personalizable is 'true'.

personalization_instructions.description: When true, this listing requires personalization. The default value is null. Will only change if is_personalizable is 'true'.

listing_type.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

tags.description: A comma-separated list of tag strings for the listing. When creating or updating a listing, valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}\\-'™©®]/u) Default value is null.

materials.description: A list of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shipping profile](/documentation/reference#operation/getShopShippingProfile) associated with the listing. Required when listing type is `physical`.

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

who_made.description: An enumerated string indicating who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.

when_made.description: An enumerated string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who_made' and 'when_made'.

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in \'item_weight_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product. Default value is null.

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_height.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product. Default value is null.

is_private.description: When true, this is a private listing intended for a specific buyer and hidden from shop view.

style.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as \"Formal\", or \"Steampunk\". When creating or updating a listing, the listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

file_data.description: A string describing the files attached to a digital listing.

has_variations.description: When true, the listing has variations.

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expiration.

language.description: The IETF language tag for the default language of the listing. Ex: `de`, `en`, `es`, `fr`, `it`, `ja`, `nl`, `pl`, `pt`, `ru`.

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price. The [`getListingInventory`](/documentation/reference/#operation/getListingInventory) method requests exact prices for available offerings.

taxonomy_id.description: The numerical taxonomy ID of the listing. See [SellerTaxonomy](/documentation/reference#tag/SellerTaxonomy) and [BuyerTaxonomy](/documentation/reference#tag/BuyerTaxonomy) for more information.

shipping_profile.description: An array of data representing the shipping profile resource.

user.description: Represents a single user of the site

shop.description: A shop created by an Etsy user.

images.description: Represents a list of listing image resources, each of which contains the reference URLs and metadata for an image

items.description: Represents a list of listing image resources, each of which contains the reference URLs and metadata for an image

videos.description: The single video associated with a listing.

items.description: The single video associated with a listing.

inventory.description: An enumerated string that attaches a valid association. Default value is null.

production_partners.description: Represents a list of production partners for a shop.

items.description: Represents a list of production partners for a shop.

skus.description: A list of SKU strings for the listing. SKUs will only appear if the requesting user owns the shop and a valid matching OAuth 2 token is provided. When requested without the token it will be an empty array.

translations.description: A map of translations for the listing. Default value is a map of all supported languages keyed to null.

views.description: The number of times the listing has been viewed. This value is tabulated once per day and **only for active listings**, so the value is not real-time. If `0`, the listing has either not been viewed, not yet tabulated, was not active during the last tabulation or there was an error fetching the value. If a value is expected, call `getListing` to confirm the value.

ShopShippingProfile.description: Represents a profile used to set a listing's shipping information. Please note that it's not possible to create calculated shipping templates via the API. However, you can associate calculated shipping profiles created from Shop Manager with listings using the API.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile.

title.description: The name string of this shipping profile.

user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) who owns the shipping profile.

min_processing_days.description: The minimum number of days for processing the listing.

max_processing_days.description: The maximum number of days for processing the listing.

processing_days_display_label.description: Translated display label string for processing days.

origin_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.

is_deleted.description: When true, someone deleted this shipping profile.

shipping_profile_destinations.description: A list of [shipping profile destinations](/documentation/reference/#operation/createShopShippingProfileDestination) available for this shipping profile.

items.description: A list of [shipping profile destinations](/documentation/reference/#operation/createShopShippingProfileDestination) available for this shipping profile.

shipping_profile_upgrades.description: A list of [shipping profile upgrades](/documentation/reference/#operation/createShopShippingProfileUpgrade) available for this shipping profile.

items.description: A list of [shipping profile upgrades](/documentation/reference/#operation/createShopShippingProfileUpgrade) available for this shipping profile.

origin_postal_code.description: The postal code string (not necessarily a number) for the location from which the listing ships. Required if the `origin_country_iso` supports postal codes. See the [Fulfillment Tutorial docs](https://developer.etsy.com/documentation/tutorials/fulfillment/#countries-requiring-postal-codes) for more info

domestic_handling_fee.description: The domestic handling fee added to buyer's shipping total - only available for calculated shipping profiles.

international_handling_fee.description: The international handling fee added to buyer's shipping total - only available for calculated shipping profiles.

ShopShippingProfileDestination.description: Represents a shipping destination assigned to a shipping profile.

shipping_profile_destination_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile destination in the [shipping profile](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop-ShippingProfile) associated with the listing.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile.

origin_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.

destination_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country to which the listing ships. If null, request sets destination to destination_region. Required if destination_region is null or not provided.

destination_region.description: The code of the region to which the listing ships. A region represents a set of countries. Supported regions are Europe Union and Non-Europe Union (countries in Europe not in EU). If \`none\`, request sets destination to destination_country_iso. Required if destination_country_iso is null or not provided.

primary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region alone, measured in the store's default currency.

secondary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region with another item, measured in the store's default currency.

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an Estimated Delivery Date. **Required with `mail_class`** if `min_delivery_days` and `max_delivery_days` are null.

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date. **Required with `shipping_carrier_id`** if `min_delivery_days` and `max_delivery_days` are null.

min_delivery_days.description: The minimum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped. **Required with `max_delivery_days`** if `mail_class` is null.

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped. **Required with `min_delivery_days`** if `mail_class` is null.

ShopShippingProfileUpgrade.description: A representation of a shipping profile upgrade option.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the base shipping profile.

upgrade_id.description: The numeric ID that is associated with a shipping upgrade

upgrade_name.description: Name for the shipping upgrade shown to shoppers at checkout, e.g. USPS Priority.

type.description: The type of the shipping upgrade. Domestic (0) or international (1).

rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the images displayed in a listing, with rank 1 images appearing in the left-most position in a listing.

language.description: The IETF language tag for the language of the shipping profile. Ex: `de`, `en`, `es`, `fr`, `it`, `ja`, `nl`, `pl`, `pt`

price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade.

secondary_price.description: Additional cost of adding the shipping upgrade for each additional item.

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an Estimated Delivery Date. **Required with `mail_class`** if `min_delivery_days` and `max_delivery_days` are null.

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date. **Required with `shipping_carrier_id`** if `min_delivery_days` and `max_delivery_days` are null.

min_delivery_days.description: The minimum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped. **Required with `max_delivery_days`** if `mail_class` is null.

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped. **Required with `min_delivery_days`** if `mail_class` is null.

User.description: Represents a single user of the site

user_id.description: The numeric ID of a user. This number is also a valid shop ID for the user\'s shop.

primary_email.description: An email address string for the user\'s primary email address. Access to this field is granted on a case by case basis for third-party integrations that require full access

Shop.description: A shop created by an Etsy user.

shop_id.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

user_id.description: The numeric user ID of the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) who owns this shop.

create_date.description: The date and time this shop was created, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The date and time this shop was created, in epoch seconds.

title.description: A brief heading string for the shop\'s main page.

announcement.description: An announcement string to buyers that displays on the shop's homepage.

currency_code.description: The ISO (alphabetic) code for the shop's currency. The shop displays all prices in this currency by default.

is_vacation.description: When true, this shop is not accepting purchases.

vacation_message.description: The shop's message string displayed when `is_vacation` is true.

sale_message.description: A message string sent to users who complete a purchase from this shop.

digital_sale_message.description: A message string sent to users who purchase a digital item from this shop.

update_date.description: The date and time of the last update to the shop, in epoch seconds.

updated_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last update to the shop, in epoch seconds.

listing_active_count.description: The number of active listings in the shop.

digital_listing_count.description: The number of digital listings in the shop.

login_name.description: The shop owner\'s login name string.

accepts_custom_requests.description: When true, the shop accepts customization requests.

policy_welcome.description: The shop's policy welcome string (may be blank).

policy_payment.description: The shop's payment policy string (may be blank).

policy_shipping.description: The shop's shipping policy string (may be blank).

policy_refunds.description: The shop's refund policy string (may be blank).

policy_additional.description: The shop's additional policies string (may be blank).

policy_seller_info.description: The shop's seller information string (may be blank).

policy_update_date.description: The date and time of the last update to the shop's policies, in epoch seconds.

policy_has_private_receipt_info.description: When true, EU receipts display private info.

has_unstructured_policies.description: When true, the shop displays additional unstructured policy fields.

policy_privacy.description: The shop's privacy policy string (may be blank).

vacation_autoreply.description: The shop's automatic reply string displayed in new conversations when `is_vacation` is true.

url.description: The URL string for this shop.

image_url_760x100.description: The URL string for this shop's banner image.

num_favorers.description: The number of users who marked this shop a favorite.

languages.description: A list of language strings for the shop's enrolled languages where the default shop language is the first element in the array.

icon_url_fullxfull.description: The URL string for this shop's icon image.

is_using_structured_policies.description: When true, the shop accepted using structured policies.

has_onboarded_structured_policies.description: When true, the shop accepted OR declined after viewing structured policies onboarding.

include_dispute_form_link.description: When true, this shop\'s policies include a link to an EU online dispute form.

is_direct_checkout_onboarded.description: (**DEPRECATED: Replaced by _is_etsy_payments_onboarded_.) When true, the shop has onboarded onto Etsy Payments.

is_etsy_payments_onboarded.description: When true, the shop has onboarded onto Etsy Payments.

is_calculated_eligible.description: When true, the shop is eligible for calculated shipping profiles. (Only available in the US and Canada)

is_opted_in_to_buyer_promise.description: When true, the shop opted in to buyer promise.

is_shop_us_based.description: When true, the shop is based in the US.

transaction_sold_count.description: The total number of sales ([transactions](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop-Receipt-Transactions)) for this shop.

shipping_from_country_iso.description: The country iso the shop is shipping from.

shop_location_country_iso.description: The country iso where the shop is located.

review_count.description: Number of reviews of shop listings in the past year.

review_average.description: Average rating based on reviews of shop listings in the past year.

ListingImage.description: Reference urls and metadata for an image associated with a specific listing. The `url_fullxfull` parameter contains the URL for full-sized binary image file.

listing_id.description: The numeric ID for the [listing](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing) associated to this transaction.

listing_image_id.description: The numeric ID of the primary [listing image](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing-Image) for this transaction.

hex_code.description: The webhex string for the image's average color, in webhex notation.

red.description: The numeric red value equal to the image's average red value, from 0-255 (RGB color).

green.description: The numeric red value equal to the image's average red value, from 0-255 (RGB color).

blue.description: The numeric red value equal to the image's average red value, from 0-255 (RGB color).

hue.description: The numeric hue equal to the image's average hue, from 0-360 (HSV color).

saturation.description: The numeric saturation equal to the image's average saturation, from 0-100 (HSV color).

brightness.description: The numeric brightness equal to the image's average brightness, from 0-100 (HSV color).

is_black_and_white.description: When true, the image is in black & white.

creation_tsz.description: The listing image\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The listing image\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the images displayed in a listing, with rank 1 images appearing in the left-most position in a listing.

url_75x75.description: The url string for a 75x75 pixel thumbnail of the image.

url_170x135.description: The url string for a 170x135 pixel thumbnail of the image.

url_570xN.description: The url string for a thumbnail of the image, no more than 570 pixels wide with variable height.

url_fullxfull.description: The url string for the full-size image, up to 3000 pixels in each dimension.

full_height.description: The numeric height, measured in pixels, of the full-sized image referenced in url_fullxfull.

full_width.description: The numeric width, measured in pixels, of the full-sized image referenced in url_fullxfull.

alt_text.description: Alt text for the listing image. Max length 250 characters.

ListingVideo.description: Reference urls and metadata for a video associated with a specific listing.

video_id.description: The unique ID of a video associated with a listing.

height.description: The video height dimension in pixels.

width.description: The video width dimension in pixels.

thumbnail_url.description: The url of the video thumbnail.

video_url.description: The url of the video file.

video_state.description: The current state of a given video. Value is one of `active`, `inactive`, `deleted` or `flagged`.

ListingInventory.description: A representation of a single listing's inventory record.

products.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.

items.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.

price_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change product prices, if any. For example, if you charge specific prices for different sized products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for size.

quantity_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the quantity of the products, if any. For example, if you stock specific quantities of different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

sku_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the product SKU, if any. For example, if you use specific skus for different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

ListingInventoryProduct.description: A representation of a product for a listing.

product_id.description: The numeric ID for a specific [product](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing-Product) purchased from a listing.

sku.description: The SKU string for the product

is_deleted.description: When true, someone deleted this product.

offerings.description: A list of product offering entries for this product.

items.description: A list of product offering entries for this product.

property_values.description: A list of property value entries for this product. Note: parenthesis characters (`(` and `)`) are not allowed.

items.description: A list of property value entries for this product. Note: parenthesis characters (`(` and `)`) are not allowed.

ListingInventoryProductOffering.description: A representation of an offering for a listing.

is_enabled.description: Whether or not the offering can be shown to buyers.

is_deleted.description: Whether or not the offering has been deleted.

ListingPropertyValue.description: A representation of structured data values.

property_id.description: The numeric ID of the Property.

scale_id.description: The numeric ID of the scale (if any).

scale_name.description: The label used to describe the chosen scale (if any).

value_ids.description: The numeric IDs of the Property values

ShopProductionPartner.description: Represents a description of a shop production partner.

production_partner_id.description: The numeric ID of a production partner.

partner_name.description: The name or title of the production partner.

location.description: A string representing the production partner location.

ListingTranslations.description: Container for all current supported translations of a listing. Note that Etsy periodically adds/removes languages, so this list may change in the future.

ListingTranslation.description: Represents the translation data for a Listing.

listing_id.description: The numeric ID for the Listing.

language.description: The IETF language tag (e.g. 'fr') for the language of this translation.

title.description: The title of the Listing of this Translation.

description.description: The description of the Listing of this Translation.

tags.description: The tags of the Listing of this Translation.

ListingImages.description: Represents a list of listing image resources, each of which contains the reference URLs and metadata for an image.

items.description: The list of requested resources.

ListingInventoryWithAssociations.description: A representation of a single listing's inventory record with associations

products.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.

items.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.

price_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change product prices, if any. For example, if you charge specific prices for different sized products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for size.

quantity_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the quantity of the products, if any. For example, if you stock specific quantities of different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

sku_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the product SKU, if any. For example, if you use specific skus for different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

listing.description: An enumerated string that attaches a valid association. Default value is null.

ShopListingsWithAssociations.description: A set of ShopListing resources with associations.

count.description: The number of ShopListing resources found.

items.description: The ShopListing resources found.

count.description: The number of ShopReceiptTransaction resources found.

items.description: The ShopReceiptTransaction resources found.

ShopReceiptTransaction.description: A transaction object associated with a shop receipt. Etsy generates one transaction per listing purchased as recorded on the order receipt.

transaction_id.description: The unique numeric ID for a transaction.

title.description: The title string of the [listing](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing) purchased in this transaction.

description.description: The description string of the [listing](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing) purchased in this transaction.

seller_user_id.description: The numeric user ID for the seller in this transaction.

buyer_user_id.description: The numeric user ID for the buyer in this transaction.

create_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

paid_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s paid date and time, in epoch seconds.

shipped_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s shipping date and time, in epoch seconds.

quantity.description: The numeric quantity of products purchased in this transaction.

listing_image_id.description: The numeric ID of the primary [listing image](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing-Image) for this transaction.

receipt_id.description: The numeric ID for the [receipt](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop-Receipt) associated to this transaction.

is_digital.description: When true, the transaction recorded the purchase of a digital listing.

file_data.description: A string describing the files purchased in this transaction.

listing_id.description: The numeric ID for the [listing](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing) associated to this transaction.

transaction_type.description: The type string for the transaction, usually "listing".

product_id.description: The numeric ID for a specific [product](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing-Product) purchased from a listing.

sku.description: The SKU string for the product

price.description: A money object representing the price recorded the transaction.

shipping_cost.description: A money object representing the shipping cost for this transaction.

variations.description: Array of variations and personalizations the buyer chose.

items.description: Array of variations and personalizations the buyer chose.

product_data.description: A list of property value entries for this product. Note: parenthesis characters (`(` and `)`) are not allowed.

items.description: A list of property value entries for this product. Note: parenthesis characters (`(` and `)`) are not allowed.

shipping_profile_id.description: The ID of the shipping profile selected for this listing.

min_processing_days.description: The minimum number of days for processing the listing.

max_processing_days.description: The maximum number of days for processing the listing.

shipping_method.description: Name of the selected shipping method.

shipping_upgrade.description: The name of the shipping upgrade selected for this listing. Default value is null.

expected_ship_date.description: The date & time of the expected ship date, in epoch seconds.

buyer_coupon.description: The amount of the buyer coupon that was discounted in the shop's currency.

shop_coupon.description: The amount of the shop coupon that was discounted in the shop's currency.

TransactionVariations.description: A list of variations chosen by the buyer during checkout.

value_id.description: The ID of the variation value selected.

formatted_value.description: Value of the variation entered by the buyer.

ListingVariationImage.description: A representation of the associations of variations and images on a listing.

property_id.description: The numeric ID of the Property.

value_id.description: The numeric ID of the Value.

value.description: The string value of the property.

image_id.description: The numeric ID of the Image.

ListingVideos.description: Represents a list of listing video resources, each of which contains the reference URLs for the videos.

items.description: The list of requested resources.

PaymentAccountLedgerEntry.description: Represents an entry in a shop's ledger.

sequence_number.description: The sequence allows ledger entries to be sorted chronologically. The higher the sequence, the more recent the entry.

amount.description: The amount of money credited to the ledger.

currency.description: The currency of the entry on the ledger.

description.description: Details what kind of ledger entry this is: a payment, refund, reversal of a failed refund, disbursement, returned disbursement, recoupment, miscellaneous credit, miscellaneous debit, or bill payment.

balance.description: The amount of money in the shop's ledger the moment after this entry was applied.

create_date.description: The date and time the ledger entry was created in Epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The date and time the ledger entry was created in Epoch seconds.

ledger_type.description: The original reference type for the ledger entry.

reference_type.description: The object type the ledger entry refers to.

reference_id.description: The object id the ledger entry refers to.

payment_adjustments.description: List of refund objects on an Etsy Payments transaction. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

items.description: List of refund objects on an Etsy Payments transaction. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

PaymentAdjustment.description: Represents a refund, which applies to a prior Etsy payment. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

payment_adjustment_id.description: The numeric ID for a payment adjustment.

payment_id.description: A unique numeric ID for a payment to a specific Etsy [shop](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop).

status.description: The status string of the payment adjustment.

is_success.description: When true, the payment adjustment was or is likely to complete successfully.

user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) (seller) fulfilling the purchase.

reason_code.description: A human-readable string describing the reason for the refund.

total_adjustment_amount.description: The total numeric amount of the refund in the payment currency.

shop_total_adjustment_amount.description: The numeric amount of the refund in the shop currency.

buyer_total_adjustment_amount.description: The numeric amount of the refund in the buyer currency.

total_fee_adjustment_amount.description: The numeric amount of card processing fees associated with a payment adjustment.

create_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

update_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last change to the payment adjustment in epoch seconds.

updated_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last change to the payment adjustment in epoch seconds.

payment_adjustment_items.description: List of payment adjustment line items.

items.description: List of payment adjustment line items.

PaymentAdjustmentItem.description: A payemnt adjustment line item for a payment adjustment.

payment_adjustment_id.description: The numeric ID for a payment adjustment.

payment_adjustment_item_id.description: Unique ID for the adjustment line item.

adjustment_type.description: String indicating the type of adjustment for this line item.

amount.description: Integer value for the amount of the adjustment in original currency.

shop_amount.description: Integer value for the amount of the adjustment in currency for the shop.

transaction_id.description: The unique numeric ID for a transaction.

bill_payment_id.description: Unique ID for the bill payment adjustment.

created_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

updated_timestamp.description: The update date and time the payment adjustment in epoch seconds.

count.description: The number of PaymentAccountLedgerEntry resources found.

items.description: The PaymentAccountLedgerEntry resources found.

Payments.description: Represents several payments made with Etsy Payments. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

count.description: The number of payments in the response.

items.description: A list of payments.

Payment.description: Represents a payment made with Etsy Payments. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

payment_id.description: A unique numeric ID for a payment to a specific Etsy [shop](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop).

buyer_user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) who paid the purchase.

shop_id.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

receipt_id.description: The numeric ID for the [receipt](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop-Receipt) associated to this transaction.

amount_gross.description: An integer equal to gross amount of the order, in pennies, including shipping and taxes.

amount_fees.description: An integer equal to the original card processing fee of the order in pennies.

amount_net.description: An integer equal to the payment value, in pennies, less fees (`amount_gross` - `amount_fees`).

posted_gross.description: The total gross value of the payment posted once the purchase ships. This is equal to the `amount_gross` UNLESS the seller issues a refund prior to shipping. We consider "shipping" to be the event which "posts" to the ledger. Therefore, if the seller refunds first, we reduce the `amount_gross` first and post then that amount. The seller never sees the refunded amount in their ledger. This is equal to the "Credit" amount in the ledger entry.

posted_fees.description: The total value of the fees posted once the purchase ships. Etsy refunds a proportional amount of the fees when a seller refunds a buyer. When the seller issues a refund prior to shipping, the posted amount is less then the original.

posted_net.description: The total value of the payment at the time of posting, less fees. (`posted_gross` - `posted_fees`)

adjusted_gross.description: The gross payment amount after the seller refunds a payment, partially or fully.

adjusted_fees.description: The new fee amount after a seller refunds a payment, partially or fully.

adjusted_net.description: The total value of the payment after refunds, less fees (`adjusted_gross` - `adjusted_fees`).

currency.description: The ISO (alphabetic) code string for the payment's currency.

shop_currency.description: The ISO (alphabetic) code for the shop's currency. The shop displays all prices in this currency by default.

buyer_currency.description: The currency string of the buyer.

shipping_user_id.description: The numeric ID of the user to which the seller ships the order.

shipping_address_id.description: The numeric id identifying the shipping address.

billing_address_id.description: The numeric ID identifying the billing address of the buyer.

status.description: A string indicating the current status of the payment, most commonly "settled" or "authed".

shipped_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s shipping date and time, in epoch seconds.

create_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The transaction\'s creation date and time, in epoch seconds.

update_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last change to the payment adjustment in epoch seconds.

updated_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last change to the payment adjustment in epoch seconds.

payment_adjustments.description: List of refund objects on an Etsy Payments transaction. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

items.description: List of refund objects on an Etsy Payments transaction. All monetary amounts are in USD pennies unless otherwise specified.

Pong.description: A confirmation that the current application has access to the Open API

ShopReceipt.description: The record of a purchase from a shop. Shop receipts display monetary values using the shop's currency.

receipt_id.description: The numeric ID for the [receipt](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop-Receipt) associated to this transaction.

receipt_type.description: The numeric value for the Etsy channel that serviced the purchase: 0 for Etsy.com, 1 for a Pattern shop.

seller_user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) (seller) fulfilling the purchase.

seller_email.description: The email address string for the seller of the listing.

buyer_user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) making the purchase.

buyer_email.description: The email address string for the buyer of the listing. It will be null if access hasn't been granted. Access is case-by-case and subject to approval.

name.description: The name string for the recipient in the shipping address.

first_line.description: The first address line string for the recipient in the shipping address.

second_line.description: The optional second address line string for the recipient in the shipping address.

city.description: The city string for the recipient in the shipping address.

state.description: The state string for the recipient in the shipping address.

zip.description: The zip code string (not necessarily a number) for the recipient in the shipping address.

status.description: The current order status string. One of: `paid`, `completed`, `open`, `payment processing` or `canceled`.

formatted_address.description: The formatted shipping address string for the recipient in the shipping address.

country_iso.description: The ISO-3166 alpha-2 country code string for the recipient in the shipping address.

payment_method.description: The payment method string identifying purchaser's payment method, which must be one of: \'cc\' (credit card), \'paypal\', \'check\', \'mo\' (money order), \'bt\' (bank transfer), \'other\', \'ideal\', \'sofort\', \'apple_pay\', \'google\', \'android_pay\', \'google_pay\', \'klarna\', \'k_pay_in_4\' (klarna), \'k_pay_in_3\' (klarna), or \'k_financing\' (klarna).

payment_email.description: The email address string for the email address to which to send payment confirmation

message_from_seller.description: An optional message string from the seller.

message_from_buyer.description: An optional message string from the buyer.

message_from_payment.description: The machine-generated acknowledgement string from the payment system.

is_paid.description: When true, buyer paid for this purchase.

is_shipped.description: When true, seller shipped the products.

create_timestamp.description: The receipt\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

created_timestamp.description: The receipt\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

update_timestamp.description: The time of the last update to the receipt, in epoch seconds.

updated_timestamp.description: The time of the last update to the receipt, in epoch seconds.

is_gift.description: When true, the buyer indicated this purchase is a gift.

gift_message.description: A gift message string the buyer requests delivered with the product.

gift_sender.description: The name of the person who sent the gift.

grandtotal.description: A number equal to the total_price minus the coupon discount plus tax and shipping costs.

subtotal.description: A number equal to the total_price minus coupon discounts. Does not included tax or shipping costs.

total_price.description: A number equal to the sum of the individual listings\' (price * quantity). Does not included tax or shipping costs.

total_shipping_cost.description: A number equal to the total shipping cost of the receipt.

total_tax_cost.description: The total sales tax of the receipt.

total_vat_cost.description: A number equal to the total value-added tax (VAT) of the receipt.

discount_amt.description: The numeric total discounted price for the receipt when using a discount (percent or fixed) coupon. Free shipping coupons are not included in this discount amount.

gift_wrap_price.description: The numeric price of gift wrap for this receipt.

shipments.description: A list of shipment statements for this receipt.

items.description: A list of shipment statements for this receipt.

transactions.description: Array of transactions for the receipt.

SellerTaxonomyNodes.description: A list of taxonomy nodes from the seller taxonomy tree.

SellerTaxonomyNode.description: A taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of an Etsy taxonomy node, which is a metadata category for listings organized into the seller taxonomy hierarchy tree. For example, the \"shoes\" taxonomy node (ID: 1429, level: 1) is higher in the hierarchy than \"girls' shoes\" (ID: 1440, level: 2). The taxonomy nodes assigned to a listing support access to specific standardized product scales and properties. For example, listings assigned the taxonomy nodes \"shoes\" or \"girls' shoes\" support access to the \"EU\" shoe size scale with its associated property names and IDs for EU shoe sizes, such as property `value_id`:\"1394\", and `name`:\"38\".

level.description: The integer depth of this taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree, with roots at level 0.

name.description: The name string for this taxonomy node.

parent_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the parent of this node.

children.description: An array of taxonomy nodes for all the direct children of this taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree.

items.description: An array of taxonomy nodes for all the direct children of this taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree.

full_path_taxonomy_ids.description: An array of `taxonomy_id`s including this node and all of its direct parents in the seller taxonomy tree up to a root node. They are listed in order from root to leaf.
